name: OVERGRAVITY
description: Overgravity is a 2D multi-player space themed shooter.The main feature that distinguishes it from other shooters is the speed of the gameplay, not to mention the dozens of weapons and powerups.There are also six single-player modes which can be highly customized.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 Processor: Dual Core Graphics: NVidia GT 650M DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 260 MB available space Sound Card: Yes

reviews.review_text: Jump from Planet to Planet and Kill Noobs. That is all there is to it the objective of the game. Pretty simple. Cool Items, Cool guns, Cool game. Achievements are kinda simple.. but Oh well. Differnt game modes including, Capture the Flag, Deathmatch, Vampire, and many more.
